name: Scamagotchi
description:
For best play experience, or to unlock the ability to save. Consider downloading the game. 

To go Fullscreen, activate it in settings.

Scamagotchi is a Virtual pet, idle game, where the aim of the game is to upgrade your virus to increase it's scamming capabilities, gaining you more money a second.

Creators (click images for itch links)

                                   

Extra Information about the game:

Clothing gives you extra money per second! The most expensive clothing you own from each category is the clothing that gives you the bonus, not the one you are wearing

In a rush? We have added a cheat menu if you don't have the time for an idle game! (If you want to play the game legit, please dont use it... obviously) This was made for any YouTubers / Streamers who want to speed up the process. To access this menu, use Left Shift + F1 in game.

This game has an ending!
